Title for a tutorial screen about the free encyclopedia and now the app is available in over 300 languages.
A shortcut icon on the home screen for getting a random article.\n{{Identical|Random}}
A shortcut icon on the home screen for continuing reading an article.
A shortcut icon on the home screen for opening the search page.\n{{Identical|Search}}
Title for the card that shows historic events of a particular day.
Suggestion text for the user indicating that there are more events for the date.

Label indicating the number of events that occurred in a certain range of years. The \"%1$s\" symbol is replaced with the number of events, \"%2$s\" is the beginning year, and \"%3$d\" is the ending year
Text to say, \'This year\'
Image content description that shows it will trigger the calendar to the next month.
Image content description that shows it will trigger the calendar to the previous month.
View content description that shows it will trigger to open the date picker dialog.

plurals.name: diff_years
plurals.item: Text indicating that the event occurred one year ago.
Text indicating that the event occurred two or more years ago.\"%d\" is the number of years.

resources.string: Label text shown to user when they have scrolled through the events till the end.
Button label for scrolling the content to the top.
Title shown at the top of the activity for selecting a wikipedia language.
Section header of the suggested languages in the languages list.
Section header of all languages in the languages list.
Title shown at the top of the activity for managing wikipedia languages.
Section header of the app languages that have been selected.
A button text for adding language to wikipedia languages list.
A button text for removing language from wikipedia languages list.
Title text for the toolbar when the action mode is activated.

plurals.name: wikipedia_languages_remove_dialog_title
plurals.item: Title of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode when only one item has been selected.
Title of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode when two or more items have been selected.

resources.string: Content of the dialog that pop-ups after clicking on the delete icon in the action mode.
Title of the dialog that pop-ups after users wanted to delete all wikipedia languages in the action mode.
Content of the dialog that pop-ups after users wanted to delete all wikipedia languages in the action mode.
Button text indicating there are more languages available to be selected.\n{{Identical|More}}
Button text suggesting user to add more languages to the app to read in.
Title of the dialog that prompts to the users about removing a Chinese variant from the app languages.
Description of the dialog that prompts to the users about removing a Chinese variant from the app languages.
Affirmative answer to open the Wikipedia languages page to manage the existing languages that have been set up.
Negative answer to keep the existing app languages settings.
Negative action button text in pop-up dialog for removing a language from app languages list.\n{{Identical|Cancel}}
Positive action button text in pop-up dialog for removing a language from app languages list.
Acknowledgement button text in warning pop-up dialog when user tries to delete all languages from app languages list.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Acknowledgement button text in warning pop-up dialog for protected editing of a page.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Acknowledgement button text in warning pop-up dialog for accounts for which editing is blocked.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Acknowledgement button text in warning pop-up dialog for editing conflict.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Acknowledgement button text in warning pop-up dialog for reverted edit.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Negative action button text in warning pop-up dialog for accounts for which editing is blocked.\n{{Identical|Cancel}}
Selection to show all types of edits.
Label of content description for tutorial page. %1$d will be replaced by the current number of pages and %2$d will be replaced by the total number of pages.
Button label for making the selected text bold.
Button label for making the selected text italic.
Button label for making the selected text into a link.\n{{Identical|Link}}
Button label for starting a bulleted list at the current cursor position.
Button label for starting a numbered list at the current cursor position.
Button label for making the selected text into a template.\n{{Identical|Template}}
Button label for adding a reference at the current cursor position.\n{{Identical|Reference}}
Button label for showing a preview of the link that is at the current cursor position.
Main navigation drawer menu label for accessing the app FAQ.
Main navigation drawer menu label for logging in or creating an account.
Message for the tool tip that shown on the main screen. The %s symbol is replaced with the username.
Message for the tool tip that shown on the main screen.
Button label for the action on tool tip that shown on the main screen.
Title for the Watchlist tooltip that shown on the main screen.
Message for the Watchlist tooltip that shown on the main screen.
Positive action button text in date picker pop-up dialog.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Positive action button text in pop-up dialog for text input.\n{{Identical|OK}}
Negative action button text in pop-up dialog for text input.\n{{Identical|Cancel}}
Negative action button text in date picker pop-up dialog.\n{{Identical|Cancel}}
Title of menu item that leads to the talk page of the user.
Title of screen that shows the talk page topics of the user. The %s symbol is replaced with the user name.
Button label for creating a new talk topic.
Message shown when a new talk topic has been submitted.
Label stating that this talk page is currently empty.
Button label for adding a reply to a talk page topic.\n\nThe functionality is similar to {{msg-mw|Discussiontools-replylink}}, so the translation can be identical.
Label for talk page topic that does not have a title.
Hint for text field for entering a new talk page topic.
Hint for text field for composing a reply to the current talk page topic.
Hint for text field for composing a new talk page topic.
Error message shown when the talk page message is empty.
Error message shown when the talk page subject is empty.
Message shown when the response has been submitted.
Button label to undo the operation of submitting the response.

Label for the last modified date of the talk page. Please preserve the %1$s and %2$s parameters, since these will be replaced with the actual date and user name.\n\nShould be similar to this MediaWiki messages such as this: {{msg-mw|Mobile-frontend-last-modified-with-user-hours}}
Menu option label for sharing edit.
Menu option label for user\'s profile page. %s indicating the username.
Menu option label for user contributions screen. %s indicating the username.
Label indicating that user is watching the article.
Label on the button suggesting the user to watch the title.
Content description for the button that goes to the next edit history.
Content description for the button that goes to the previous edit history.
Label on the button suggesting the user to thank the edit.
Menu item label for going to the user page of the selected user.
Title text on the thank dialog
Dialog text for the thank dialog
Positive button label on the thank dialog.
Negative button label on the thank dialog.\n{{identical|Cancel}}
Message shown to user after thanking an edit in the diff screen. %s is the contributing user\'s username.
Message shown when the article is added to Watchlist. The %1$s symbol will be replaced by the article title and the %2$s symbol will be replaced by the time period.
Button label for changing the time period of the article in Watchlist.
Text for the time period that exists permanently.
Text for the time period that exists for 1 week.
Text for the time period that exists for 1 month.
Text for the time period that exists for 3 months.
Text for the time period that exists for 6 months.
Message shown when the article is removed from Watchlist. The %s symbol will be replaced by the article title.
Title of the bottom sheet that shows the available options of the time period.
Label for the time period that exists permanently.
Label for the time period that exists for 1 week.
Label for the time period that exists for 1 month.
Label for the time period that exists for 3 months.
Label for the time period that exists for 6 months.
Message shown when the user\'s watchlist is empty.
Filter selection to show all items in the watchlist
Filter selection to show only Talk pages in the watchlist
Filter selection to show only main-namespace pages in the watchlist
Filter selection to show only non-main and non-talk pages in the watchlist
Label text to indicate that a page has been moved.
Label text to indicate that a page has been protected.
Label text to indicate that a page has been deleted.
